name: Tree Defenders
description:
Made in 1 week for Brackeys Jam 2023.1

Theme: An end is a new beginning

Description:

Angry lumberjacks are trying to cut down your tree!

Place the defenders on branches to defeat the lumberjacks one by one, day by day.

Your tree has been cut down? Don't worry, that's just the beginning of the fun!

Choose buffs to get upgrades which will help in next runs. Buffs do not reset after losing, they stack up!

Instructions:

Press the button in the upper left corner to start the day.

Press the button on the right to open the defenders' tab and left click on a defender to grab them. Move them over a slot on the tree and release LMB to drop and place the defender on the slot.

The number in the top right corner shows your axe count. You get axes for beating lumberjacks. They are the currency that can be spent on new defenders.

Controls:

LMB - Grab and hold a defender (release to drop them)

ESCAPE / SPACE - Pause/Resume game

M - Mute/Unmute audio

Credits:

Code - Q34

Art - Q34

Music - Q34

Sounds - freesound

Font - google fonts
